Title: Establishes a correctional employee protective labor practices board
Summary: Establishes a correctional employee protective labor practices board to make recommendations regarding labor practices and working conditions for correctional employees, and institutional safety of both correctional employees and incarcerated individuals.
LawCode: Add Art 37 ยง1045, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the labor law, in relation to establishing a correctional employee protective labor practices board
